Title: Sinai, St. Catherine’s Monastery, Arabic 438
Descriptive title: Mimars ; Lives of Saints ; Paradise of the Fathers
Author: Athanasius, Saint, Patriarch of Alexandria, -373|~|Ephrem the Syrian, Saint, 303-373|~|Isaac, Bishop of Nineveh, active 7th century|~|John, Climacus, Saint, active 6th century|~|John Chrysostom, Saint, -407|~|Basil, Saint, Bishop of Caesarea, approximately 329-379
Contents note: Mimars and Sermons by SS. Dorotheus, Anastasius, Ephraem, Isaac the Syrian, Isaac Bishop of Nineveh, Isaiah, John Climax, John Chry­sostom and Basil the Great ; Selection from Paradise of the Fathers ; Selection from the Gospels ; Apophthegmata by St. Moses of Scetis ; Lives of SS. Jacob the Persian, Mark of Scetis, Onuphrius and others, and John who put himself in a well ; Life of St. Anthony the Great by St. Athanasius
